Package com.marginallyclever.ro3.apps.viewport.renderpass

package com.marginallyclever.ro3.apps.viewport.renderpass
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.marginallyclever.ro3.apps.viewport
     
    com.marginallyclever.ro3.apps.viewport.viewporttool
     
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractRenderPass
    AbstractRenderPass handles common methods for all RenderPass.
    DrawBackground
    Draw the background.
    DrawBoundingBoxes
    Draw the bounding box of each MeshInstance in the scene.
    DrawCameras
    Draws each Camera as a pyramid approximating the perspective view frustum.
    DrawDepthBuffer
    DrawDepthBuffer is a render pass that is responsible for rendering the stencil buffer to the viewport.
    DrawDHParameters
    Draws each DHParameter as two lines from the previous joint to the current joint.
    DrawJoints
    Draw a ring around each hinge joint to show the range of motion.
    DrawMeshes
    Draw each MeshInstance as a Mesh.
    DrawPoses
    Draw each Pose as RGB lines from the origin to the X,Y,Z axes.
    DrawStencilBuffer
    DrawStencilBuffer is a render pass that is responsible for rendering the stencil buffer to the viewport.
    MeshMaterialMatrix
    A mesh and the material to render it with.
    RenderPass
    Classes which implement RenderPass are drawn as part of - or on top of - the 3D scene.
    RenderPassHelper
